command:
Welcome to the training camp! Some of the best have trained here!
Ever heard of Prince Corin of Archenland? He was here a few months
ago! I am your instructor.

You are here to train, correct? You will see a bunch of areas up ahead. Go into
one, and you will fight that monster. You can alos learn skills, in the area behind
them. You know what? To start things off, I'll teach you one right now!

What I just taught you is a war cry you can use in battle. Try using it next
chance you get.

Oh yeah, I am also in a shop where you can buy stuff. Trust me, you will
need some of it.
When you think you have trained enought, talk to me.
